mapper.insert: insert into tp_fans (logo, tag, title, fan_num, fan_dev, createtime, shop_price, address, catename, auth, auth_body, original, read_num, industry, type, sel_class, scale_man, scale_women, liu, auth_bodys, auth_body_change, used_existx, account, monmoney, admoney, wechat, user_id ) values (#{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fan_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fan_dev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shop_price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auth,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original,jdbcType=BIT}, #{read_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sel_class,jdbcType=BIT}, #{scale_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale_women,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_bodys,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_body_change,jdbcType=BIT}, #{used_existx,jdbcType=BIT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update tp_fans set logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=BIT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fan_num = #{fan_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fan_dev = #{fan_dev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_price = #{shop_price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, catename = #{catename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth = #{auth,jdbcType=BIT}, auth_body = #{auth_body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original = #{original,jdbcType=BIT}, read_num = #{read_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, sel_class = #{sel_class,jdbcType=BIT}, scale_man = #{scale_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scale_women = #{scale_women,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, liu = #{liu,jdbcType=BIT}, auth_bodys = #{auth_bodys,jdbcType=BIT}, auth_body_change = #{auth_body_change,jdbcType=BIT}, used_existx = #{used_existx,jdbcType=BIT}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monmoney = #{monmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admoney = #{admoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, logo, tag, title, fan_num, fan_dev, createtime, shop_price, address, catename, auth, auth_body, original, read_num, industry, type, sel_class, scale_man, scale_women, liu, auth_bodys, auth_body_change, used_existx, account, monmoney, admoney, wechat, user_id from tp_fans where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, logo, tag, title, fan_num, fan_dev, createtime, shop_price, address, catename, auth, auth_body, original, read_num, industry, type, sel_class, scale_man, scale_women, liu, auth_bodys, auth_body_change, used_existx, account, monmoney, admoney, wechat, user_id from tp_fans

where.if: AND address =#{area_id} and industry = #{industry} and used_existx = 1

mapper.insert: insert into tp_fans (logo, tag, title, fan_num, fan_dev, createtime, shop_price, address, catename, auth, auth_body, original, read_num, industry, type, sel_class, scale_man, scale_women, liu, auth_bodys, auth_body_change, used_existx, account, monmoney, admoney, wechat, user_id ) values (#{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fan_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fan_dev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shop_price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auth,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{original,jdbcType=BIT}, #{read_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sel_class,jdbcType=BIT}, #{scale_man,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scale_women,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_bodys,jdbcType=BIT}, #{auth_body_change,jdbcType=BIT}, #{used_existx,jdbcType=BIT}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
